Praise<S>1984</S> ye the LORD<S>3050</S>. Praise<S>1984</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>, O my soul<S>5315</S>. <sup>Praise ye: Heb. Hallelujah</sup>
While I live<S>2416</S> will I praise<S>1984</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>: I will sing praises<S>2167</S> unto my God<S>430</S> while I have any being.
Put not your trust<S>982</S> in princes<S>5081</S>, nor in the son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, in whom there is no help<S>8668</S>. <sup>help: or, salvation</sup>
His breath<S>7307</S> goeth forth<S>3318</S>, he returneth<S>7725</S> to his earth<S>127</S>; in that very day<S>3117</S> his thoughts<S>6250</S> perish<S>6</S>.
Happy<S>835</S> is he that hath the God<S>410</S> of Jacob<S>3290</S> for his help<S>5828</S>, whose hope<S>7664</S> is in the LORD<S>3068</S> his God<S>430</S>:
Which made<S>6213</S> heaven<S>8064</S>, and earth<S>776</S>, the sea<S>3220</S>, and all that therein is: which keepeth<S>8104</S> truth<S>571</S> for ever<S>5769</S>:
Which executeth<S>6213</S> judgment<S>4941</S> for the oppressed<S>6231</S>: which giveth<S>5414</S> food<S>3899</S> to the hungry<S>7457</S>. The LORD<S>3068</S> looseth<S>5425</S> the prisoners<S>631</S>:
The LORD<S>3068</S> openeth<S>6491</S> the eyes of the blind<S>5787</S>: the LORD<S>3068</S> raiseth<S>2210</S> them that are bowed down<S>3721</S>: the LORD<S>3068</S> loveth<S>157</S> the righteous<S>6662</S>:
The LORD<S>3068</S> preserveth<S>8104</S> the strangers<S>1616</S>; he relieveth<S>5749</S> the fatherless<S>3490</S> and widow<S>490</S>: but the way<S>1870</S> of the wicked<S>7563</S> he turneth upside down<S>5791</S>.
The LORD<S>3068</S> shall reign<S>4427</S> for ever<S>5769</S>, even thy God<S>430</S>, O Zion<S>6726</S>, unto all<S>1755</S> generations<S>1755</S>. Praise<S>1984</S> ye the LORD<S>3050</S>.
